pages.text: 26|184|Va az kase, ki sumo va ummathoi pesinro ofarid, parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]
26|185|Onon guftand: «[Ej Suajʙ] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
26|186|Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti va mo turo duruƣgu mepindorem
26|187|Pas, agar rost megui, porae az osmonro ʙar [sari] mo ʙiandoz»
26|188|[Suajʙ] Guft: «Parvardigoram ʙa on ci mekuned, donotar ast»
26|189|Pas, uro duruƣgu angostand va azoʙi ruzi aʙr [-i otasʙor] ononro faro girift. Ba rosti, ki on [ʙoroni otas] azoʙi ruzi havlnoke ʙud
26|190|Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast; va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|191|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|192|Va ʙa rosti, [in] Qur'on furufiristodai Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|193|Ruhu-l-amin [Caʙrail] onro furud ovardaast
26|194|Bar qalʙi tu [nozil kardaast], to ʙimdihanda ʙosi
26|195|[Qur'onro] Ba zaʙoni araʙii ravsan [nozil namud]
26|196|Va ʙe tardid, [ʙasorati nuzuli] on dar kitoʙhoi pesinijon [niz omada] ast
26|197|Ojo hamin nisona ʙarojason kofi nest, ki ulamoi Bani Isroil az [haqiqati] Qur'on ogohand
26|198|Va agar onro ʙar ʙa'ze az ƣajriaraʙho nozil mekardem
26|199|Va [pajomʙar] onro ʙarojason mexond, ʙa on imon nameovardand
26|200|[Ore] In guna on [kufru takziʙ]-ro dar dilhoi gunahgoron coj dodem
26|201|Ammo ʙa on imon nameovarand, to on goh ki azoʙi dardnokro ʙuʙinand
26|202|Pas, nogahon dar hole ki ʙexaʙarand, ʙa suroƣason meojad
26|203|Pas, [dar on hol] megujand: “Ojo muhlate [ʙaroi tavʙa] xohem dost?”
26|204|Ojo onon azoʙi moro ʙa sitoʙ xostorand
26|205|Ojo donisti, ki agar ononro solho [az zindagii dunjo] ʙahramand sozem
26|206|Sipas on ci ki ʙa onon va'da doda sudaast, ʙa suroƣasonn ʙijojad
